uk.ac.gate.cloud.job

Class JobManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.gate.cloud.job.JobManager

  • public class JobManager
extends Object
    Main entry point to the job management API to manage annotation jobs you have reserved.
    Author:
    Ian Roberts

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JobManager(RestClient client)
      Construct a JobManager using the given RestClient to communicate with the API.
      JobManager(String apiKeyId, String apiPassword)
      Construct a JobManager accessing the GATE Cloud public API with the given credentials.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InputDetails getInputDetails(String url)
      Fetch details of a specific job input specification given its detail URL.
      Job getJob(long id)
      Get an individual job by ID.
      Output getOutputDetails(String url)
      Fetch details of a specific job output specification given its detail URL.
      List<JobSummary> listJobs(JobState... states)
      List all the jobs owned by the authenticated user that are in the specified states.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • JobManager

        public JobManager(RestClient client)
        Construct a JobManager using the given RestClient to communicate with the API.
        Parameters:
        client - the client object used for communication

      • JobManager

        public JobManager(String apiKeyId,
          String apiPassword)
        Construct a JobManager accessing the GATE Cloud public API with the given credentials.
        Parameters:
        apiKeyId - API key ID for authentication
        apiPassword - corresponding password

    • Method Detail

      • listJobs

        public List<JobSummary> listJobs(JobState... states)
                          throws RestClientException
        List all the jobs owned by the authenticated user that are in the specified states.
        Parameters:
        states - states of interest. If not specified, the default is to return RESERVED, READY, ACTIVE and COMPLETED jobs.
        Returns:
        list of JobSummary objects representing the matching jobs - call the details method to get the full detail (which requires another API call).
        Throws:
        RestClientException

      • getJob

        public Job getJob(long id)
           throws RestClientException
        Get an individual job by ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the job
        Returns:
        the details of the requested job.
        Throws:
        RestClientException

      • getInputDetails

        public InputDetails getInputDetails(String url)
                             throws RestClientException
        Fetch details of a specific job input specification given its detail URL.
        Parameters:
        url - the detail URL as returned by an earlier API call
        Returns:
        the requested input specification.
        Throws:
        RestClientException

      • getOutputDetails

        public Output getOutputDetails(String url)
                        throws RestClientException
        Fetch details of a specific job output specification given its detail URL.
        Parameters:
        url - the detail URL as returned by an earlier API call
        Returns:
        the requested output specification.
        Throws:
        RestClientException
